definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: What are you getting your dad for Father's Day?
sentences.chinese: 你在父親節要送你爸什麼？

sentences.english: How about selecting a Bible verse or two to fit Father's Day?
sentences.chinese: 選擇一兩句聖詩來渲染父親節的氣氛怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: Dine-in fathers can take part in Father's Day lucky draw.
sentences.chinese: 用餐父親可參加父親節幸運抽獎。

sentences.english: What can we include, to make our Father's Day salutations more special?
sentences.chinese: 我們可以囊括進哪些內容使得父親節的致敬更特別呢？

sentences.english: A warm wish from your son on Father's Day.
sentences.chinese: 你的兒子，在父親節向您獻上溫馨的祝福。

sentences.english: A warm wish from your grandson on Father's Day.
sentences.chinese: 你的孫兒，在父親節向您獻上溫馨的祝福。

sentences.english: To my wonderful Grandfather on Father's Day.
sentences.chinese: 在父親節這一天，送給我最好的祖父。

sentences.english: Happy Father's Day to all the dads out there, and have a great weekend.
sentences.chinese: 祝福每一個父親父親節快樂，並過一個美好的週末。

sentences.english: Thanks, and Happy Father's Day to all the dads outthere. Have a great weekend.
sentences.chinese: 正是這些美好值得我們去記住父親節以及每一天。

sentences.english: Dady, with the ring of 0'o clock, Father's Day is coming.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，隨着0點鐘聲的敲響，父親節到了。

sentences.english: I brought my father a pair of socks on the Father's Day.
sentences.chinese: 父親節那天我爲父親買了一雙短襪。

sentences.english: In 1924, President Coolidge recommended that Father's Day become a national holiday.
sentences.chinese: 1924年，柯立德總統建議父親節爲全國性的節日。

sentences.english: It's Father's Day at last, and Froggy is so-o-o excited.
sentences.chinese: 這是父親節，最後，和蛙是所謂的面向對象的興奮。

sentences.english: Massage chairs are popular gifts for Father's Day.
sentences.chinese: 按摩椅一向是父親節的搶手禮物。

sentences.english: In 1910, the first Father's Day was observed in Spokane.
sentences.chinese: 1910年，第一個父親節在斯波坎市誕生。

sentences.english: FATHER S DAY IS A TIME TO REMEMBER ALL THE GOOD THINGS THAT DADS DO FOR US.
sentences.chinese: 父親節是憶起爸爸們爲我們所做的一切的時刻。

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)
